text: I'd Climb the Highest Mountain is a 1951 American romantic drama movie directed by Henry King and based on the 1910 novel A Circuit Rider's Wife by Corra Harris. It stars Susan Hayward, William Lundigan, Rory Calhoun, Barbara Bates, Kathleen Lockhart and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: I'd Climb the Highest Mountain
